name: Let's Go Camping (New Song By Chet Lam)
lyric:
Be a good boy for a whole week
Stuck in the car sardined on the streets
Summer's here bodies in heat
You know what I mean
Pack some hot dogs we need some meat
To do the hard work to make us complete
Summer's here everything's in heat
Let's give us a treat
Come on
It's time for me to have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just come
It's time for me to have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just come
It's time for me to have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just come
Let's get started hop off the truck
Pitch a tent unload some stuff
The flap is down just the two of us
Let's keep out the bugs

comments.brief: 听到瞬间就有go camping的念想了~~
